Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are wandering along Leviathan Drive, east of Evander's Shops.
Room.LongDescription: The large center to the west is known as Evander's World of Weapons, where you can purchase any number of finely crafted weapons and armors. Evander boasts the best polearms shop in the lands, and has one of the finest repair shops available. The plaza may be entered from either Netherworld Lane or Kafkan Way on the north and south, respectively.
